properties.publicRemarks:
Discover Your Perfect Desert Retreat!
Nestled within the esteemed 55+ gated community of Four Seasons at Terra Lago, this new, fully furnished gem offers a breathtaking golf course setting with amazing sunset and mountain views. This property is a golfer's and nature lover's paradise. Surrounded by a sprawling quarter-acre lot, you'll enjoy sweeping views of nearby mountains and the lush fairway of the 14th hole, North course. The outdoor living space is a true haven, complete with a sparkling saltwater pool and spa, inviting fire pit, BBQ area and beautiful desert landscaping. Inside you will find a spacious, open-concept living area with plenty of seating and a 75-inch TV. The home features two generous bedrooms, each with its own ensuite, flatscreen TV, Cal King or Queen bed, along with a convenient half bath and laundry room. The versatile office/den includes a size full sofa bed, 65-inch TV and desk, providing extra accommodations, or a peaceful workspace. The gourmet kitchen features quartz counter tops, large island and high-end stainless steel appliances and is well-appointed with all the items you need to prepare delicious meals. The separate dining area, and cozy reading nook, offer additional spaces to entertain, unwind or relax. 
Monthly rent covers WiFi, YouTube TV, trash, pool service, gardening service, and utilities (capped at $150 per month, with any overage paid by tenant). The monthly rent is $5,500 for October, $5,900 per month for November and December and $6,200 per month January through May.
Indulge in the perks of the Four Seasons at Terra Lago Community as a resident. You'll enjoy exclusive access to The Lodge, a hub offering a state-of-the-art fitness gym, a grand ballroom, a library/computer room, and a salon. With a full-time Lifestyle Director on site, your calendar will be filled with engaging activities like Zumba and Yoga classes, billiards, and various social clubs. Outdoor enthusiasts will enjoy golf, tennis, basketball, pickleball, horseshoes, bocce ball, indoor and outdoor pools with cabanas, and a generous firepit for relaxing evenings. Immerse yourself in the vibrant, active lifestyle that awaits you at Four Seasons at Terra Lago, where there's always something exciting to do just steps from your door.
You will also find plenty of entertainment and activities close by! Fine restaurants and world-class shopping, The Tennis Gardens, McCallum Theater, Acrisure Arena, Casinos...the list goes on!

properties.publicRemarks:
Now available for long-term or seasonal lease, this beautifully furnished 4BD/3BA home in guard-gated Terra Lago features the largest floor plan, offering over 3,100 sq. ft. on a premium, private corner lot. The backyard is a true desert retreat with a private pool, spa, outdoor kitchen, and stunning mountain views ideal for both relaxing and entertaining.

Interior highlights include an open-concept living room, spacious kitchen, separate family room, and a split-bedroom layout with a generously sized primary suite. Additional features: 3-car garage, turnkey furnishings, and a well-appointed layout throughout.

Enjoy resort-style living in a gated community with scenic lakes, walking trails, and easy access to golf, casinos, Acrisure Arena, shopping, and dining.

Available furnished. Inquire for lease terms and seasonal rates.

properties.publicRemarks: This well maintained home offers a unique opportunity for luxury living in Terra Lago's highly desirable Four Seasons 55+ community. Situated on a private lot, this home boasts excellent curb appeal, highlighted by a custom glass front door and a bright, open interior filled with natural light from large windows. The chef's kitchen is a true highlight, featuring granite countertops, a spacious center island, elegant cabinetry with abundant storage, bar seating, stainless steel appliances, and a walk-in pantry with a custom glass door. This space seamlessly flows into the dining and living areas, creating an ideal environment for everyday living and entertaining. The generous den offers flexible space for various uses, whether a home office, 3rd bedroom, hobby room, or guest area. The primary bedroom suite includes a private bathroom with a full-size walk-in shower. Outside, the private backyard is perfect for relaxation and entertaining. The home also includes a convenient 2-car garage and a separate laundry room with additional storage. Residents of this vibrant community have access to an impressive array of amenities, including The Lodge Clubhouse, a fitness center, indoor and outdoor pools, a spa, bocce ball, tennis, pickleball, and more. With its proximity to local attractions such as championship golf courses and Acrisure Arena, this home truly offers the perfect blend of comfort, luxury, and convenience.
